DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect exercise pregnancy upon maternal metabolism , include weight gain , fat distribution , level glucose cholesterol . We also conduct pilot study examine feasibility study health infant bear woman study .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Physical Activity Metabolic Syndrome Pregnancy & Fetal Outcome
DOC.detailed_description: Obesity overweight become important public health problem United States , measure urgently need address issue . For many woman , pregnancy time excessive weight gain decrease physical fitness , may follow postpartum weight retention . Women develop hypertension diabetes mellitus pregnancy high risk development disorder future . Because implication pregnancy-related weight gain metabolic change pregnancy future maternal health , intervention maintain improve fitness pregnancy may important downstream health effect . In addition , maternal metabolic parameter intra-uterine environment important implication neonatal outcomes subsequent child health . This study provide data effect intervention increase vigorous physical activity pregnancy short-term maternal fetal outcome .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman 1845 year old receiving prenatal care MAMC Women gallbladder Who speak English Are 14 week pregnant study entry Do plan deliver MAMC Have medical contraindication Unwilling participate exercise intervention program Are 18 year age Currently engage regular vigorous exercise program
